nodes.text: Matt Fraction (born December 1, 1972) is the pen name of Eisner Award–winning comic-book writer Matt Fritchman. Matt Fraction is a co-author of "The Kloo Horn Cantina Caper," a short story that was published in the 2017 anthology From a Certain Point of View.
He is the husband of Kelly Sue DeConnick, and they have a son named Henry and a daughter named Tallulah.
